historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-103, see notes following ยง 50-1641.01.

Miscellaneous Notes

Section 11 of D.C. Law 17-103 provides that this section shall be subject to appropriation.

DC CODE ยง 50-1641.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Notwithstanding any other law or regulation, the Council shall increase the number of public bicycle parking spaces at the John A. Wilson Building.
The total number of public bicycle parking spaces provided at the John A. Wilson Building shall be no less than 16; provided, that:

Design, purchase, and installation of the public bicycle parking spaces shall be done in coordination with the District Department of Transportation ("DDOT") from funds either already allocated to DDOT in fiscal year 2008 or already allocated to the Council in fiscal year 2008 for the maintenance of the John A. Wilson Building;
The design of the bicycle parking spaces shall be consistent with the architectural style and beauty of the John A. Wilson Building; and

At least one bicycle parking space shall be located adjacent to the public entrance on Pennsylvania Avenue, N.W., if this is determined to be consistent with historic preservation guidelines and National Park Service regulations.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: John A. Wilson Building bicycle parking requirements.
